title: Ride Free Fearless Money: Calm Your ACK!
desc: Ride Free: Fearless Money: Calm ?Your ACK! ?is a 3 hour class geared towards folks who work multiple jobs, are struggling, are artists/freelancers, have a side hustle, and/or don't have alot of savings or a handle on money management. We explain and introduce best practices around: ? emotional health & self care around our relationship to money ? budgeting, saving, accruing ? at any income level ? credit: what it is, credit reports, how to deal with errors on your credit report, how to fix your credit ? freelancer  business ?tips for maximizing your side job[s] ? taxes: writeoffs, schedule Cs, when to TTAA* [*talk to an accountant] We briefly go over ? investing: retirement, mutual funds, stocks as aligned with your values You?ll leave the class with: ? an action plan to work on your financial?ACK! ? resources to use ? an ?accountabilibuddy? from class with whom to discuss and follow up on your plans [optional but helpful] ? tips & tricks to life hack and manage your resources - access to an email list to chat about your ACK! moments [also? optional] Registration is limited to 8 people per in-person class. Cost: $25-$55 sliding scale.  How do I know what to pick?  It's based on your access to resources.? More on this sliding scale here. ? Are there scholarships available?  Yes, two seats per class thanks to our donors and based on need -- email for info: hd [at] hadassahdamien.com More info about this series: http://ridefreefearlessmoney.com
